last_episode_to_air.name: Kam On the Rocks
last_episode_to_air.overview: Nicole Zanatta and Derrick Henry each choose the clone they want to be with forever; Killa Kam takes her remaining Rock look-alikes into her world to see how they fit in.

name: Game of Clones
overview: Game of Clones is the most radical dating experiment to ever hit television. In each episode, MTV stars will date seven clones of their celebrity crush -- who may look the same but are totally different people -- and when they look beyond those pretty (identical) faces, each dater will discover which of these famous doppelgangers melts their heart and which just makes their skin crawl.

episodes.name: Clone Culture
episodes.overview: DJ Pauly D must choose his one and Clonely; reality star Kailyn Lowry ("Teen Mom") gets showered with attention by her Quavo look-alikes; reality star Nicole Zanatta ("The Challenge") takes the leap and meets her seven stunning Ciara look-alikes.

episodes.name: Clones Make it Twerk
episodes.overview: Kailyn Lowry hopes to find love among her three A- Migos; Nicole Zanatta tries to figure out which Ciara clones are worth keeping; Derrick Henry ("Ex on the Beach") gets introduced to look-alikes of his dream girl, supermodel Gigi Hadid.

episodes.name: Super Model Citizens
episodes.overview: Nicole Zanatta's sister turns up and makes her rethink everything; Derrick Henry takes his supermodel clones out on the town; Queen Kam swings by.

episodes.name: Kam On the Rocks
episodes.overview: Nicole Zanatta and Derrick Henry each choose the clone they want to be with forever; Killa Kam takes her remaining Rock look-alikes into her world to see how they fit in.
